string-array.name: message_array
string-array.item: Hey! Why did you click the button?
Again?! I already told you not to! >:(
Just stop this nonsense right now!
There are other buttons to click
You just don\'t give up don\'t you.
Ok. I give up. Please press the button
Dangit the reverse psychology did not work.
*Sigh* I\'m going to give you another chance.
